page.title: 11PASTIMES-CATTERICK-TUNSTALL
page.content: Residents free time intrests cover a great variety of sport etcetera. Golf is popular with both men and women as is cycling. The ladies enjoy swimming, yoga, aerobics, keep fit, tennis, badminton, and dancing. The men participate in cricket, football, rugby, squash, quoits, shooting, hunting and jogging. Many of these sports are popular with children as are riding, gymnastics and ballet dancing. Those who like to live life at a slower pace enjoy bird-watching or walking along the river Swale, across fields and through woods or standing watching the horse racing at Catterick race course. Gardening is a most popular past-time and this is reflected in the riot of colour seen in gardens during the summer months and much appreciated by tourists.
